body_html:
i believe that @Songweiping is correct and that is specified on the Luong's paper if i remember correctly.
for your information, i'd implemented both and they actually had no significant difference in final performance for NMT tasks(in both log-perplexity and BLEU).

body:
i believe that @Songweiping is correct and that is specified on the Luong's paper if i remember correctly. 
for your information, i'd implemented both and they actually had no significant difference in final performance for NMT tasks(in both log-perplexity and BLEU).
